tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE classic_cars (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  model VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  manufacturer VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  production_year INT NOT NULL,
  engine_size FLOAT,
  transmission VARCHAR(50),
  color VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE CarSpecifications (
    spec_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    car_id INT REFERENCES ClassicCarModels(car_id),
    engine_type VARCHAR(50),
    horsepower INT,
    torque INT
);

CREATE TABLE classic_car_models (
  car_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  model_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  manufacturer VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  production_year INTEGER,
  country_of_origin VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE car_specifications (
  specification_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  car_id INTEGER REFERENCES classic_car_models(car_id),
  engine_size VARCHAR(20),
  horsepower INTEGER,
  top_speed INTEGER,
  weight INTEGER
);

CREATE TABLE car_specifications (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_id INT NOT NULL,
    engine_type VARCHAR(255),
    fuel_type VARCHAR(255),
    horsepower INT
);
